website_summaries.verdict: Practical, quick-loading and easy to haul from place to place, this is a great all-around tool organizer for a very low price.
pros: Holds basic tools to do work around the house
Users can quickly add items to the bucket
cons: Clip holder’s cloth construction is too flimsy to handle some heavier tape measures
Longer tools may stick out too far in the pockets

customer_reviews.title: YES, it DOES fit Lowe’s & HD 5 gal bucket - see how
customer_reviews.text: It seems several reviewers have had trouble fitting this over a DIY 5 gal bucket. Maybe they slept through geometry class... The Boss bucket will not slip over the standard DIY 5gal bucket, but does fit perfectly if installed as stated below. 1) turn Bucket Boss inside out 2) insert top INTO bucket 3) fold Bucket Boss over sides of bucket 4) slip one side of Boss Bucket under bucket handle I ended up buying 3 more, one for each of my commonly used carpentry, electrical, plumbing and gardening tools. Thanks for reading
customer_reviews.author: T. Norris

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Tons of pockets that are very versatile
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Tons of pockets that are very versatile. One thing i would change would be making the inside pockets a couple of different sizes. Some of them needed to be slightly larger to fit some hardware organizers. Other than that, I love it. Well worth the money and some.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Great for a variety of uses, good pocket options, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. Just what I needed to tame the pile in my 5 gal camper tool bucket. Plenty of pockets, large and small sizes on the outside and larger on the inside. Well thought out spaces for hammer, and bucket handle can be used or down. It has a lidded pocket for smaller items, and I love the hooked strap for holding a roll of tape. Canvas is heavy enough that it feels like it will last for many years, not so stiff that you can't easily get your tools in and out. I might buy another one to keep around the house. I can see all types of uses for this item. Keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Fair Comprehensive Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: After throwing out my garden tools for the third time because I would put them in the bucket with the clippings and then empty the bucket forgetting that they were in there this makes a huge difference. I love it the only thing that I would have liked to have seen would be that the pockets would be wider and perhaps deeper but I will use a bungee to keep the taller instruments iin the pockets and I think I'm going to see if I can open the stitching to widen some of the compartments but it's a great idea and it's so well-made
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Artist

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Nice wish some of the bigger pockets were deeper not bigger and maybe a heavy duty work bucket with a good heavy duty handle was offered with it and see through pockets because some tools you stick in pockets and handles sticking out when your in a hurry to grab a tool you can’t find what your looking for quickly but I love the idea of putting it over a bucket for a tool bag because when you got to clean up fast you can just throw it in the bucket until you have more time , great quality materials made for work keeps tools secure
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for one of the older style canvas bucket tool holders for my son. He's got his own house now and needed something to tote tools around. Would have preferred a 100% canvas model. This is the closest I could find at a reasonable price. I'll update the post if it doesn't hold up to the job. It's canvas with a vinyl backing.
customer_reviews.author: Doug K

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!! Great product at a great price and shipped fast--thank you!
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy, well stitched canvas bag which should last for years. For the price, I expected much less, but I am delighted to be proved wrong. This is as well made as products were years ago. I'll be buying more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Morgaine Bergman

customer_reviews.title: Good gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my brother who is a painter. It is very good quality for the price. Seems durable and we'll made, looks nice. He is very happy with it! I may purchase more for others..
customer_reviews.author: Wikkid

customer_reviews.title: I cant express how much I love this thing.
customer_reviews.text: I cant express how much I love this thing. I have a bucket in the back of my work van that I toss tools into when I dont have time to dig out my tool box. Over time It just is full of tools and I have to dig around to find what I need. The Bucket Boss turned the bucket into a well organized tool holder. I loved it so much I bought one of their gate mouth bags and it has now replaced my clunky old tool box. I wish I had found this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Dermit The Hermit

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your tools protected and organized for easy and fast access.
customer_reviews.text: Great way to organize your tools and keep them protected when taking them to the job site. Lots of pockets of varying sizes. Seems well made and the seams are sewn with heavy duty thread. The pockets are reinforced and have stood up to sharp chisels, knives, and scrapers. There are loops to hold hammers and long items. The bucket handle swings freely so it is easy to carry. Easy to remove so you can empty the bucket and then reinstall. Way better than just dumping your tools in a bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Jim McCoy

customer_reviews.title: For the dad that has literally everything
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my OCD husband who loves to tinker around the house and is constantly running up and down the stairs because he forgot a pencil or a screw or whatever. He was thrilled. Good quality, seems to be very durable
customer_reviews.author: Sara M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Auto Detailing!
customer_reviews.text: Makes life 1,000 X's easier on the job. Good quality and I'd definitely recommend these for any Auto detailer looking to carry brushes and other hand tools securely.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommendable
customer_reviews.text: So I had one of these when I was first starting out in construction many years ago. Had forgotten about them seeing this on here and decided to buy it and try it. Very glad that I did it really makes a bucket way more organized and useful. I’m supper happy with this purchase and I’ll recommend this to all of my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Jered P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the remodeler
customer_reviews.text: It seems like I had one of these years ago and wasn't that impressed. Well, now I'm working on a whole-house remodel and I ended up with a 5-gallon bucket just full of tools and misc junk. It was getting pretty bad so I ordered this and WOW, what a great item! Solid construction and really functional. I know commercial guys need tool belts to be more mobile but for me, just going room-to-room, this rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: I suppose for a weekend handyman, this tool holder ...
customer_reviews.text: I suppose for a weekend handyman, this tool holder is more than adequate. For me, it isn't able to fit my needs. The main issue that I have is with the outside pockets. There is an upper and lower row. The issue is that the upper row pockets are the same shallow depth as the bottom row. My longer wrenches and screwdrivers aren't held in very well. The inside pockets are also shallow so a lot of my tools just sit at the bottom of the bucket. I'll be shopping for a new one very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Hewitson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my garden tools. Actually it was a pleasant surprise; has pockets inside and out; fits a 5 gallon round bucket perfectly. All my small garden tools fit easily inside and out. I already have red Home Depot brand bucket liners; one for carpentry tools; one for painting supplies. I wanted something a little different for outside; something with a little green for the yard and garden. I highly recommend this product. Price is very reasonable. Saved me a trip to the store. I would buy it for either purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A.

customer_reviews.title: Most disorganized man using it quite well-a definite win win
customer_reviews.text: If you had any idea how disorganize my construction working husband is-he does everything from tiling to impact windows to drywall to electricity-he has way too many tools to Carrie. He threw a fit when I bought this and I asked him to try it and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Taking Action!

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Was noticing tools always laying around whenever my husband would work on something in the house. Thought this might solve the issue. Easy to use. Just place within a bucket and immediately you have efficient and practical storage. Great for gardening too....no more tools scattered all over the garage. Great that this can be carried around, using the bucket handle.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have s tool box or 5 but for some reason I just love this. Dump my bigger tools, gloves and misc things in the bucket but the pockets allow me to have my basic and some speciality tools readily available without having to dig through a tool box. Wish I had one of these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Zoli

customer_reviews.title: Handy. Bought 2.
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed having this to organize items that we would use in projects around the house. Easy to store small items but pockets don't usually give to pack it full capacity. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: ANDI B.

customer_reviews.title: Stunning quality
customer_reviews.text: Oh I love this bucket boss. I struggle to find a bucket in South Africa to fit it as our buckets are wider. It good quality. I use two of them for my bee removals.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne

customer_reviews.title: Must Have Tool Organizer!
customer_reviews.text: Although this won't (IMHO) replace a tool-belt, it is a great system to organize and store your on-site tools. It is well made and fits the bucket without any quirks. I do a lot of in-home tech jobs, including flat-screen installation, low voltage wiring ,etc. I store my various tools in the Boss and grab what I need once inside and drop into my tool-belt. The BB makes it fast and easy to find what I need without fumbling around in buckets and tool boxes. Get one!
customer_reviews.author: Cal Blue

customer_reviews.title: only con is that many of the pouches/slots/pockets are fairly shallow causing some tools to not fit super well, more specifically
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted, only con is that many of the pouches/slots/pockets are fairly shallow causing some tools to not fit super well, more specifically, fit securely. I keep my bucket setup on a bucket dolly in the back of my truck as I am a field tech. Tools on the outside can fall out because of the shallowness of the pockets. Not a huge deal as I leave the outside empty for the most part and fill it as needed once I am on a job site, but it something to be aware of nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Michrn83

customer_reviews.title: Great for the garden.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice for carrying tools and supplies. Holds all the small tools in the various pockets and keeps them organized. Larger items can be placed in the bucket. Very tough fabric. I left it out in a heavy rain one time. Of course it was soaked and the bucket had about 3" of water in it. I hung upside down on a tool handle - 1/2 hour inside out, 1/2 hour right side out. Dried out completely with no damage, mold or smell. I expect it tl last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: D. C. Goodson

customer_reviews.title: It works and works well! Look no further.
customer_reviews.text: Bucket Boss is the Boss. Well made, heavy duty, lots of pockets, fit the bucket and it looks good. What else do you need? Just get it. Probably makes a nice gift for the handy man / gal in your house because its a lot nicer being organized on your little projects without having to haul the entire tool box right. Great idea, should have got one a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Horse-N-Round

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this item. I’ve had others but this is the best so far, in that there are umpteen pockets, inside and out, as well as a couple hook type things, in and out. It is thoughtfully designed, it seems, for real tools a person would need to stash. Not just sloppy pockets like some. I have stuffed one larger-than-5-gallon bucket with stuff and now it seems, I will need to outfit another bucket because I have accumulated so many tools. I didn’t realize it because I never tried to put them all away in an organized manner before. The fabric is very substantial too. Overall a very good item at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: farmhouselady

customer_reviews.title: Changed my whole manner of fixin' stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've had about every kind of tool box made...and I've found this one to be the best yet...because when I have to do a fixit job, I load up with the tools AND SUPPLIES I'm going to need for that particular job...and go. Having the bucket to haul battery powered drills, extra batteries, and drill bit/driver sets is a godsend...can't do that with other tool boxes. The item is well made...good cloth...good stitching. Strong.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Reilley

customer_reviews.title: It does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot and it helps to be organized while working on a project . I thought it would be a more useful item . It has added to my handyman projects because now I have another step before finishing a job. For most of my jobs I only need a few tools. I used to grab and go . Now I fill this up with a lot of unneeded tools and then end up putting everything away. This is good for someone going out on jobs all mine are in my home. I like it though .
customer_reviews.author: JEFFREY DAMASCO

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to organize my craft caddie
customer_reviews.text: I used a large paint bucket from a home improvement store and then used this tool organiser to completely organise all my knitting and crochet tools. It took about 30 minutes and and I had everything I needed at my fingertips. I also did this in my kitchen, for utensils, and in the Bathroom for my makeup. It WORKS! this is the most amazing way to keep everything neat, and orderly. This can travel without spilling every object everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: The Happy Cooker

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good, It Has Held Up Well
customer_reviews.text: He's been using this daily going from job to job for two months working in the sheet metal trade and has zero complaints. The fabric has held up nicely. He really likes the inside pockets and said it helps keep everything nice and organized. He shopped around before buying this and for the price with this one having the inside pockets, this one was the best deal and the quality so far is backing that thought up. If/when anything changes with it, I'll definitely update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Lanie

customer_reviews.title: who doesn't like to lug around a tool box but likes to ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish I'd have thought of this design!!! We have 3 of these for our home use & have purchased several for friends that admire it. This was for our son, who doesn't like to lug around a tool box but likes to see what he's got & find it easily, carry it around, & still have room in the bucket for a few basics when going from room to room for repairs, tweeking, adjustments, etc.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaD

customer_reviews.title: Good tool holder
customer_reviews.text: This tool holder certainly does the job. It seems well made and very durable. If I had a complaint it would be, give me a few larger pockets. There’s like 1000 small pockets, and 1 big pocket. I’m using mine to hold car detailing tools. Very few of my many tools fit easily into the smaller pockets. That said, I’ve figured out how to make it work. It’s handy to have my tools and detail spray bottles in one 5 gal bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Solly

customer_reviews.title: Recommend you buy the bucket too
customer_reviews.text: This item would not fit on a Lowe's work bucket. I had to cut the sides in order to make it fit. Recommend you buy the bucket too!
customer_reviews.author: gman

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: This is like an ad hoc job toolbox. I have 8 or 9 toolboxes, each for different things, plumbing, electrical, carpentry etc. This lets you load up just what you need for a specific job and gives you extra room to store materials and the like, power tools etc. and still weighs less than most of my toolboxes. I would recommend getting some rubber grips for the bucket handles, I got some from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff L

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: Very nice all-purpose bucket tool holder! Will hold just about any hand tool you need it to. The middle being open is nice too because you can bring extra tools inside the bucket, then take them out and use the bucket for trash while still having a place to hang your tools. Very helpful tool for a handyman or anyone who uses multiple tools while needing a place to put trash/larger tools.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: This is a great item. No longer do I have to walk ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item. No longer do I have to walk back and forth because I have left something in the garage while I am in the garden. It fits a Home Depot bucket perfectly and I would buy it again, and again, but it is so sturdy that I don't know if it would ever wear out. But it would make a fantastic gift for a gardener all set up on a bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Jean D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good. Not great
customer_reviews.text: It works ok. Fits a lowes bucket just fine. My big issue is the pockets suck. Im not sure whoever made this actually has used any tools. The pockets are not deep enough is the main issue. Tools stay in long as you don't jostle it. I have screwdrivers and wrenchs with some other stuff it works i like the build.of it but ill be replacing g it soon as I can
customer_reviews.author: Fenrir

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Installs easily by turning it inside out and upside down. Slide it inside the bucket and fold it down. Handy pockets all around, plus a key clip. I do wish it had a few lower pockets to make smaller items more accessible (e.g.: the nub of a carpenter's pencil I have). They say it will accommodate a bucket lid, but I don't see how. Good product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Askov

customer_reviews.title: The Boss of all bucket bosses.
customer_reviews.text: Works better than expected and pockets, lots of pockets bot inside and outside the bucket. It’s a little tight on my homer bucket andi don’t know If my bucket is taller than other 5 gallon buckets or I’m using it wrong but I have about 4 inches of clearance before reaching the bottom of the bucket and unlike in the photograph. Yeah, I recommend this to everyone and it’s even better than the bucket liner I got from the Home D.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Adams

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfect and stays tight on the bucket
customer_reviews.text: Well made. It fits perfect and stays tight on the bucket. Thick material that should hold up. It just needs a little dirt and break in time. Price was good and Quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Scott from Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly useful for the most difficult person to shop for!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a master craftsman. He was amazed and said this is something he always wanted but couldn’t find. Call him “old-fashioned” and probably wouldn’t own one, since he’s more of a hardware store type. Amazon doesn’t disappoint! I have NEVER been able to think of the perfect gift for him and he absolutely loved this and USES it! Shocking, I know! Especially since he’s the most difficult person I know who to shop for.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMommyLoves7

customer_reviews.title: Seems very durable
customer_reviews.text: I looked at many of these bucket style tool organizers and decided on going with this one based on other reviews. Many of the lesser known brands I saw had more but smaller pockets on the outside so larger tools could be an issue. This ended up being the right choice for my purposes of organizing the smaller collection of tools that I have for home projects, but still it has much more space for me to add more as I go. Build quality is overkill for my needs but seems durable and should hold up for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K

customer_reviews.title: Home for bucketed tools
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had pocket room for real tools. I’ll try to make do, but I don’t keep my screwdrivers in a bucket. I wanted something for my mosaic work that actually uses a bucket. I can get grout and a float in & out of the bucket easy enough (though I didn’t want to), but what am I going to do with the other tools that are not dinky toys?
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Clayton Cordell, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Organized and Efficient - Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing and inexpensive item for "spot to spot" or stationary work and recreational projects. It's ideal for tasks that require a range of items in one (mostly level) central location so you aren't wearing a loaded down tool belt or walking back and forth. It can be used for any number of tasks from Painting, Repair, Gardening, IT, Cleaning etc. You can't go wrong buying this for yourself or someone that does any task in one location that requires more tools/items than they want to hold or carry. 5/5 rating
customer_reviews.author: Rookwood

customer_reviews.title: Great bucket tool bag.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is very nice. Seems to be quality and well put together.I looked at other more expensive ones, but this one ended up being my choice and I am very happy. For those who asked in other reviews, it fit both a Lowe's and Home Depot bucket just fine.
customer_reviews.author: R. H.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for work on the go!
customer_reviews.text: I am surprise at how much this can hold! There are tons of pockets all the way around. I emptied two tool boxes into the pouches, and still had room inside the bucket. It is so easy to grab everything I need for projects around the house, or to throw in my truck and take a ton of tools with me. I would recommend this to anyone who likes convenience!
customer_reviews.author: Hanson Bourne

customer_reviews.title: Made in Thailand with known cancer causing agents.
customer_reviews.text: Wanna organize your tools and expose your skin to known cancerous materials, well look no more! Buy buy buy before they sell out, cancer for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H

customer_reviews.title: Find the right tool every time with this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love all the storage pockets. I put a cool gel pack in with my iPhone inside the phone pocket so it doesn’t overheat on 90 degree days. There’s plenty of storage pockets for my wire cutters, needle nose pliers, regular pliers, snips, scissors, rasp, 10 inch garden labels, markers, hooks and so much more! No more searching thru a jumbled mess of debris!
customer_reviews.author: SunflowersN Bluebirds

customer_reviews.title: Works well for garden tools.
customer_reviews.text: Had a tote previously and liked it. However, it is easier to find my garden tools, and all my longer handled tools fit into the bucket, which I like. Numerous pockest so can reach gloves easily as well as a closed over pocket for cell or whatever. Also, less like to have wren's build a nest in it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Doogal's Mom

customer_reviews.title: little pricey, but handy
customer_reviews.text: very handy. Started out as one of them dumb gimmicky things set you buy. After a couple of months it has become really handy to keep all my house Tools in, so I don't have to keep going out to the garage and getting this tool or that tool. It should last a long time because it's not setting outside. I don't know how well this would hold up though for a contractor getting it wet, and throwing it in the back of the truck
customer_reviews.author: me1313

customer_reviews.title: SUPER DE DUPER!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Got it for my husband so he would stop carrying his tools around in a stinkin BACKPACK! It looks handy and manly. Fits all types of his thingamabobbers. Wifes if you are looking just buy it already. Men if you are looking just buy it already...
customer_reviews.author: Dkm90

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Once you figure out what tools fit into what pockets, this becomes a life saver for small projects. Having a bucket to simply throw leftover screws or trash into is also handy. The actual materials are very high quality and it feels like it will last for years. One con is that some heavy tools on the outside end up hanging a bit sideways, making carrying it awkward.
customer_reviews.author: ZapD

customer_reviews.title: My favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I use it to carry all of my electrical tools around (apprentice electrician, here) at work. It carries a lot of them easy, and in an organized fashion. The material is durable and well made, plus I like the brown look of it. My favorite "tool bag."
customer_reviews.author: B wake

customer_reviews.title: Great product in its simplicity
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to turn a simple 5 gal bucket into a very useful carrying tool. We use it at the barn to carry products and tools we use to care for horses. Very easy for one person to carry everything they need for a day of grooming with everything easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for tools. Limited hunting usage
customer_reviews.text: Well made with heavy sturdy material. Lots of pockets but I wish some were bigger. I bought this for coyote hunting, yes I know it’s designed for tools but thought it would serve my hunting needs too. Extra batteries, scents,calls etc.... It works but it’s limited due to the small pockets. Still gave it 5 stars for its intended use but if you are considering for hunting,the outside pockets are of limited use.
customer_reviews.author: Coach Brant

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It fits perfectly over the white 5 gallon bucket I bought from the local hardware store that has an orange logo and initials HD. Lol. I love all the pockets. I canput all my gardening tools in this, and I can put my phone in one of the pockets.
customer_reviews.author: DU

customer_reviews.title: Awesome item!
customer_reviews.text: We love this item. It is so handy to just pick up the bucket and move along in work. There is always less mess and a lot more fun when we have an organized system for our tools. This is a great item. We will be getting more of these for friends.
customer_reviews.author: Sha Cha

customer_reviews.title: Well Built with One Exception
customer_reviews.text: The material is very good, however, my only complaint is that none of the pocket holders are open at the bottom to hold longer tools like screw drivers or long channellocks. Guess I could cut a slit in the bottom of one of the pocket holders. Other than that, I'd say it's well built.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Very handy.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Saw a friend with one and I threw rocks at my tool box. There are other cheaper ones at box stores but this is well made compared to those. This is a great gift to a young person starting out in life. This, a bucket and a few tools to start them out will point them in the right direction.
customer_reviews.author: Bagger

customer_reviews.title: Get one. You won't be disappointed 😉
customer_reviews.text: This caddy make life a lot easier in my world and had enough pockets to put all the detailing things I need to be right at had so I won't have to be going back and forth. It's better with a 3 gallon bucket so that I can see my spray bottles and not have to look down into a 5 gallon bucket to see what I'm getting
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Holds all of my smaller hand tools which is exactly what I wanted. There are pockets that fit my channel locks, center punches and chisels, pliers, knives, locks, and screwdrivers but I would recommend using a different bag for screwdrivers. There’s also a small tab on the outside that’s perfect for a tape measure, and small, relatively wide pockets on the inside that are good for all kinds of things. I keep notebooks and lockout tags in them.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Xyloto

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great and economical way to store the tools you use the most. I like to be able to grab the bucket and easily take my tools around the house or yard, wherever I am working. I can throw one or two extra things that I will need into the bucket and have everything available to me.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Much Better Quality than I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because my fiance is lovable maker of messes. Right now he's working on our kitchen and his tools are everywhere. I had a spare bucket and saw this item so I ordered it. I was pleasantly surprised by how sturdy the fabric is and the quality of the product. Put it in the bucket and voila! No more scattered tools or miscellaneous debris on our floor!
customer_reviews.author: Erika C

customer_reviews.title: Great addition!
customer_reviews.text: First one of these I've purchased. Just what I needed to keep the tools handy for various jobs around the property. The apron holds all of the small items I need, and the open space allows me to bring along the right power tools for the job I'm working on. Fits great in the back of the truck.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and great for organizing!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband. He loves it. Keeps all his stuff organized and he loves that he can turn it into a seat at job sites.
customer_reviews.author: PixelMinx

customer_reviews.title: Far better value than the others I considered
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bucket-style tool-organizer where price was very important. But I hate buying junk So, based on the price and reviews, I ordered this Bucket Boss Bucketeer and I was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ajgarvin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far. It is durable and arrived exactly as described. That being said, it works well for my intended purpose, make sure it will work well for yours before you order. Don't forget to consider the tools that you intend to place in the pouches, this seems to be the problem folks run into with these bucket bags/liners.
customer_reviews.author: Rocket

customer_reviews.title: works as described. i work on a boom lift ...
customer_reviews.text: works as described. i work on a boom lift and attach this to the bucket. helps out tremondously. the only real fault i found is those little slots for screwdrivers arent quite big enough. your tool can fall out if your not careful.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: A solution for both of us
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband. We are working on several different projects right now and he has tools everywhere. There are so many pockets and possibilities. He has space for everything he needs and then some. Also very easy to transport. Overall, very useful. I could even see myself getting one in the future. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Kayley15

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Fits well. I'd probably design the pockets a bit differently, but everyone carries different tools and it does it well enough for me. I just use this for around the house. Helps keep everything I need in one place for most small projects.
customer_reviews.author: ChodieGrundleson

customer_reviews.title: Very handy!
customer_reviews.text: I picked up a cheap 5-gallon bucket from Lowe's, and this organizer fits just fine. I love that all my tools are visible and easy to access. Plus I have room in the bucket for larger tools, a screw organizer, project parts, etc. This product has definitely made my life a little bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R.

customer_reviews.title: Heat stuff laying around during a project then buy this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for a Christmas gift. It’s a great way for him to load up his tools when doing projects in the house so everything’s not laying all over the place. Very sturdy and easy to use. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: luce

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would not retain shape or would start sagging, but it held all my tools and more no problem. I still have room for more stuff, AND it lets me fit a seat with extra compartments, so my bucket is truly a tool bucket. And still comparatively portable, too!
customer_reviews.author: WLH

customer_reviews.title: Well built and tough
customer_reviews.text: This is the best brand in the market. Made of strong canvas material. Less one star because the pockets could be deeper. Long thin items like screw drivers may fall out because pockets are loose for this type of item. Otherwise a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: sturdy, well made and can hold many tools. Got this for son-n-law. It was on his wedding registry list and for first wedding I love getting sensible stuff. Came on time and well packaged and it was just what he wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great invention
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this thing. I'm able to early organize my lawn item and keep everything nice and neat. It holds everything my gloves, shears, spade, safety glasses you name it, it holds it
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: A Great Tool "Bucket" Idea
customer_reviews.text: My husband saw one that his friend had, and he thought, "What a brilliant idea"! So he's definitely going to love it, It's very sturdy, durable and at a good price,
customer_reviews.author: R. N.

customer_reviews.title: Overall great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Am I the only one who thought it came with the bucket? I guess I didn’t read well enough. We bought a standard bucket, and it doesn’t fit as snug as the photo, a little loose until we filled the pockets. Overall great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: A great item to organize your tools 🛠
customer_reviews.text: Best evention: everybody does have an empty bucket, right ! Tiered of going through the big drawer or container you keep all your tools in ! Right, dropp in the tool sleeve in a 5 agallon bucket, start organizing and everything can easily found when you need a tool for your project.
customer_reviews.author: G-Man

customer_reviews.title: Keeps  and unorganized person organized.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for keeping all my tools organized. It has space for large and small items. We took it with us on a recent rockhounding trip and it held all our tools and there was still room in the bucket for rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I get this years ago. Previously used a peg board in my garage. Now I leave my most commonly used tools in this. Much easier than running back to the garage when I forget I need the stud finder or whatever other need. Much lighter than my old steel tool box. Also does double duty as a kids toy to keep your infant and toddler entertained while you knock out your project.* *Parental supervision required
customer_reviews.author: Bk

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these to give as gifts for fathers day, they loved it! They had no problem fitting it on a "Lowes" bucket. They thought it was the best thing since sliced bread!!
customer_reviews.author: topaz270

customer_reviews.title: The best I've found
customer_reviews.text: After trying various styles, types and materials, this has stood the test of time....no rips, tears or cracking. The perfect vehicle for carrying all my garden tools in one handy carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Judith R. Correll

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for handymen guys
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a Easter basket and it is amazing quality. My boyfriend uses it everyday for everyday household tools he often uses. I purchased a HD bucket and it fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Brit D

customer_reviews.title: Great to hold all your tools.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Fits snugly over a 5 gallon. I let and holds all the tools I need in it. The bucket does get quite heavy once you load it down with tools. It does have enough pockets to hold a good amount of tools you would need for about any job
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Uting

customer_reviews.title: for gardening or tools
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this for gardening with a swivel padded top to sit on. It holds my tools on the outside while other items i will need can be stored in the bucket
customer_reviews.author: Jen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: So far I love it and would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today,and Its as described. Seems to be well made. Time will tell and show how well it will last. Hopefully it will last and make it worth spending the money on. So far I love it and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Easy Money

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of this thing. I have my go to tool bucket with all of my essentials. It hold a huge amount of tools and is easy to organize with lots of versatility.
customer_reviews.author: TateD

customer_reviews.title: Great, high quality organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great organizer, much better quality than I was expecting. The price had gone up since I purchased but I'd still buy again. This replaced a husky brand organizer that wore out, it actually left me with room for more tools, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, useful
customer_reviews.text: If you tend to throw tools into a bucket to haul around your work area, this is seriously for you. Holds a TON. Great quality for the price. Helps keep it organized so you aren't digging for everything.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Maslonka

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space for all your gardening needs!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made bucket liner with plenty of pockets and loops for all your garden tools. Fits perfectly in a Menard's green bucket. I haul this all around the garden with me while planting, weeding; pruning... you name it. There are no straps to mess with, so it doesn't come loose and fall off like other bucket liners on the market. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: best friend
customer_reviews.text: this bucket boss is my best friend at work it holds everything i need for quick access and fast pace jobs that require a lot of production in short time. i recommend this to anyone that works in construction, electrical, etc
customer_reviews.author: JonCameron Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son and it was perfect. Bought a new 5 gallon bucket from HD and put it on, fit great and now he has a tool bucket. No more rummaging thru numerous tool boxes to find the regular tools he uses on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Well made.  Thoughtfully constructed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very usable bucket tool organizer. VERY well designed pockets, pouches & straps make this extremely useful and usable and an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Jozeppi

customer_reviews.title: Holds tools great!
customer_reviews.text: Fits pretty good in my Lowe’s bucket. Slots/pockets could be a hair deeper, but probably just the ancient screwdrivers I have in ‘em from my grandpas 1950’s-60’s collection haha. Great to have essential tools in the house, accessibly vs. having to go out to the garage at our apartment complex, where my big, heavy tool boxes are a bit further away. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: E.T. Lander

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: this is the best bucket organizer, more pockets than we expected and all filled. Product is well made, easy to remove from the bucket to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: A place for everything
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these as a Christmas gift, but really wanted to keep it. A month later, I bought one for me. I'm using this to corral all my yard hand tools. While it's too soon to work outside, when the time comes I will know where everything is!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great tool organizer
customer_reviews.text: This was a great replacement to a bag for tools. Easy to install, and very sturdy. No more digging for tools, they are easy to find and organize.
customer_reviews.author: BTS34

customer_reviews.title: Organize your tools
customer_reviews.text: My husband had gardening tools al over the place. This organizer makes it easy to keep everything in one place and have a bucket handy at the same time. The fabric is also sturdy and wears well.
customer_reviews.author: heather morley

customer_reviews.title: Yay! Love this
customer_reviews.text: Durable canvas fabric, nice dirt color. Very cool bucket tool. Never knew I needed it until I got it and now I know where everything is and smaller tools don't get lost or rusted anymore. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Allisa

product_meta.title: Bucket Boss The Bucketeer Bucket Tool Organizer in Brown, 10030
product_meta.description: Color:BrownThe world’s first bucket organizer, the original Bucket Boss. Fits any 5 gallon bucket, providing instant organization with 30 pockets for tools and 3 interior loops for hammers and pry bars, all while keeping the bucket center open for bulk storage. Made of durable 600 denier poly ripstop fabric.
feature_bullets: Bucket Boss The Bucketeer Bucket Tool Organizer in Brown, 10030
3 interior loops for hammers, drills, pry bars and other long-handled tools
